title: 73. A Typical Day in My Codependent Past
description:
Hey sis!

In this episode, I am going to be walking you through what a typical day in my codependent past looked like. I reflect on the college days of obsessing over getting a text back, feeling insecure, and feeling unworthy. I also reflect on some of my shadows that jumped out during these times. Can't wait for you to tune in!

Click here to join the waitlist for my upcoming Self-love course to get $150 off! Hurry! Waitlist closes September 25th, 2020!


Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
